Case: Sean-May-MVA-8-19-2025. The client is Sean May. The record shows a note dated Friday, September 5, 2025 at 08:36:19 GMT-04:00. Earlier that same day, at 08:13 AM, an email was sent from HOME CLMS-STATEFARMCLAIMS to JUSTIN@WHALEYLAWFIRM.COM with the subject line 17-89H6-64T.

The body of the email stated, “Please see the attached policy documents for Sean May.” The message ends with “Thank you.” It was sent by Nicole Gramlich, a Claim Specialist in Auto Injury. Her work phone number is 678-935-3272, and her office hours are Monday through Friday, 8:00 AM to 4:30 PM EST.

episodes.natural_language:
Case: Sean-May-MVA-8-19-2025. Initial client contact on August 21, 2025, with Justin regarding a motor vehicle accident involving Sean May (DOB 7/13/1970; SSN 402-02-2679). The client, Sean May, can be reached at 502-817-7825 and resides at 48311 Hale Ave, Louisville, KY 40211. The incident occurred on August 19, 2025 at the intersection of 13th and Broadway in Louisville and was reported to LMPD under Report # 25-097403 and DLN M95-736-313. Sean went to Norton West Louisville and reports back pain. The case includes PIP (Personal Injury Protection) through State Farm and BI (Bodily Injury).

Associated entities listed include Rumpke and Michael Rally, with contact numbers 502-887-0341 and 800-882-8171 ext 7766. The person making contact is Justin, and the date/time of the contact is August 21, 2025.
